org.mongodb.morphia.query.validation
Class ExistsOperationValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.mongodb.morphia.query.validation.OperationValidator
      org.mongodb.morphia.query.validation.ExistsOperationValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validator
public final class ExistsOperationValidator
extends OperationValidator

Checks if the value can have the FilterOperator.EXISTS operator applied to it. Since this class does not need state, and the methods can't be static because it implements an interface, it seems to be one of the few places where the Singleton pattern seems appropriate.

Method Summary

          Get the instance.
protected  FilterOperator getOperator()
          This method is called by the apply method to determine whether to validate the query.
protected  void validate(MappedField mappedField, Object value, List<ValidationFailure> validationFailures)
          Performs the actual validation, and assumes appliesTo has returned true

Method Detail

validate

protected void validate(MappedField mappedField,
                        Object value,
                        List<ValidationFailure> validationFailures)
Description copied from class: OperationValidator
Performs the actual validation, and assumes appliesTo has returned true

Specified by:
validate in class OperationValidator
Parameters:
mappedField - the field being queried
value - the query value, to apply the operator to. This should not be null.
validationFailures - the list to add any new ValidationFailures to. If validation passed this list will not change.

getOperator

protected FilterOperator getOperator()
Description copied from class: OperationValidator
This method is called by the apply method to determine whether to validate the query. The validator will only work for a single FilterOperator, and this will be returned by this method

Specified by:
getOperator in class OperationValidator
Returns:
the FilterOperator this validator cares about.

getInstance

public static ExistsOperationValidator getInstance()
Get the instance.

Returns:
the Singleton instance of this validator
